competitors.name: Microsoft
competitors.notes: Continued competition in personal finance space, though less intense in tax/accounting

competitors.name: H&R Block
competitors.notes: Major tax preparation competitor with physical locations and software

competitors.name: Sage (Peachtree)
competitors.notes: Established small business accounting software provider

context: By 2005, Intuit had successfully pivoted to web-based products. The U.K. version of Quicken was discontinued in 2005. Competition from Microsoft in personal finance had decreased, but traditional competitors like H&R Block and new cloud-based entrants began emerging.
